metadata.name: Sad Bride
metadata.description:
Mrs. Homa, a 17-year-old girl, became the bride of the Farmanfarmayan family without her consent and at her father's request.

In Iran and especially during the Qajar period, women were considered property.
For this reason, a real estate document has been brought on the bride's shirt.

This collection reviews the history of Iranian women from the Qajar period to the early Pahlavi period.
In future works with the theme of men will be presented. Who are in contact with the women of this collection.
And in the next series, it slowly approaches the contemporary history of Iran.

Music played during the Qajar period is recorded with the voice of Ms. Zari.

Format: 1680*1080/   22 seconds.
